channel.title: CVE Feed for WpDirectoryKit -- WP Directory Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WpDirectoryKit -- WP Directory Kit

item.title: CVE-2024-37253|2024-07-10T18:28:17.525Z -- wpdirectorykit -- wp%20directory%20kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in WpDirectoryKit WP Directory Kit allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Directory Kit: from n/a through 1.3.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37253|2024-07-09T13:13:18.783Z -- wpdirectorykit -- wp%20directory%20kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in WpDirectoryKit WP Directory Kit allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Directory Kit: from n/a through 1.3.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-29774|2024-06-04T17:57:30.974Z -- wpdirectorykit -- wp%20directory%20kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WpDirectoryKit WP Directory Kit allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Directory Kit: from n/a through 1.2.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-37253|2024-07-09T10:05:21.305Z -- wpdirectorykit -- wp%20directory%20kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in WpDirectoryKit WP Directory Kit allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Directory Kit: from n/a through 1.3.6.
